channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump victory sparks seismic week for stock market. Investors need to keep cool.
item.description: Donald Trump’s election victory made for a seismic week on Wall Street — but investors should guard against getting pulled into emotionally charged ma...

item.title: How does a gambling site lose money? DraftKings just lost $250 million in revenue — mostly on NFL games.
item.description: The company experienced “the most customer-friendly stretch of NFL sport outcomes we have ever seen,” its CEO said.

item.title: ‘I never dreamed I’d be in this position’: I’m 69 and have $10,000 in legal bills from my divorce. Is now the time to borrow from my IRA?
item.description: “I do not have the funds for professional advice.”

item.title: Stocks Hit New Records, Close Out Best Week of the Year
item.description: The Dow Jones Industrial Average touched 44000 for the first time.

item.title: I inherited $200,000. One of my daughters is married with kids, but the other has debts. Do I split my windfall 50/50?
item.description: “She has incurred a lot of debt due to the financial strain of a sick pet, a car loan, student loans and an unpaid military home loan.”

item.title: Starbucks’s new CEO is making changes — here’s what customers and industry experts think of them
item.description: “It’s about time they stopped charging for all the different milks,” said one restaurant-industry consultant.

item.title: The WSJ Dollar Index Rises 0.5% to 99.46
item.description: The WSJ Dollar Index was up 0.5% to 99.46 — up for two of the past three trading days.
